original_text: And ye shall tell my father of all my glory in Egypt, and of all that ye have seen; and ye shall haste and bring down my father hither.
korean_text: 당신들은 내가 애굽에서 누리는 영화와 당신들이 본 모든 것을 다 내 아버지께 아뢰고 속히 모시고 내려오소서 하며

sentences.original_text: And ye shall tell my father
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 너희는 내 아버지께 말할 것이다

sentences.original_text: of all my glory in Egypt
and of all that ye have seen
and bring down my father hither
